title: Steve Cropper obituary
description: Guitarist with the American band Booker T and the MGs who was also a successful songwriter and producer
content:
In an era when many rock guitarists appeared to believe that the spoils would inevitably go to the fastest and flashiest, Steve Cropper showed generations of younger players the virtues of economy and concision.
Cropper, who has died aged 84, demonst... [6705 chars]

title: 'Don't look back in anger', says German president of UK ties post-Brexit
description: Frank-Walter Steinmeier says both sides had decided to not look back in anger while referencing band's reunion.
content:
Germany's president has drawn a parallel between his country's ties with the UK post-Brexit to the recent reunion of the famously feuding Oasis brothers.
Frank-Walter Steinmeier told MPs and peers that disappointment and uncertainty had followed the ... [2667 chars]

title: Ireland, Spain and the Netherlands to boycott Eurovision 2026 as Israel cleared to compete
description: Decision not to hold vote on Israel’s participation comes in spite of several broadcasters calling for its exclusion
content:
Ireland, Spain and the Netherlands will boycott next year’s Eurovision after Israel was given the all-clear to compete in next year’s song contest in spite of several participating broadcasters calling for its exclusion.
At the general assembly of th... [3266 chars]

title: Farage accuses BBC of double standards after racism allegations
description: The Reform UK leader turns fire on the BBC as he faces further questions about allegations of teenage racism.
content:
Reform UK leader Nigel Farage has accused the BBC of "double standards" after being asked about racist and antisemitic comments he is alleged to have made as a teenager.
In an earlier BBC interview, the party's deputy leader Richard Tice dismissed th... [2272 chars]

title: Former Newcastle goalkeeper Hislop reveals treatment for prostate cancer
description: The former Newcastle, West Ham and Portsmouth goalkeeper Shaka Hislop has revealed he has prostate cancer which has spread to his pelvic bone
content: The former Newcastle, West Ham and Portsmouth goalkeeper Shaka Hislop has revealed he has prostate cancer, which has spread to his pelvic bone. Hislop said he had been diagnosed with “a fairly aggressive prostate cancer” about 18 months ago, which re... [1860 chars]
